DOC.brief_summary: To validate FSFI ( Female Sexual Function Index ) -K , FSFI - 6 item Quality Sexual Function ( QSF ) version Korean language cancer patient .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Sexual Function Scale Female Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Due observational nature study aim evaluate internal consistency validity Korean version Questionnaire , formal sample size power calculation perform . When number observation ( item ) per subject range 4 6 , roughly 152-199 patient require show 10 % increase intraclass correlation baseline ICC 30 % 85 % power 5 % type I error rate . The sample size determine base calculation practical consideration . The pilot study perform base 30 people ( include reference ) , main study include 1100 people ( consider 10 % drop-out 200 people group ) cancer type ( ovary , cervix , endometrium , breast ) healthy female . Total 1130 patient .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman Female without history cancer Cancer free recent linkage At least 18 year age Able speak read Korean Sexual activity within 3months . Female cancer patient History gynecological breast cancer At least 18 year age Able speak read Korean Sexual activity within 3months . Women unable complete questionnaire . Refuse participate survey .
